processingMessage: Your summary log is being uploaded and automatically validated
processingKeepOpen: Keep this page open and do not refresh it
submittingMessage: Your summary log is being submitted
validationFailuresHeading: Your summary log cannot be uploaded
validationFailuresDescription1: We have found the following issues with the file you selected.
validationFailuresDescription2: You will need to correct these issues before uploading your summary log.

failure.REGISTRATION_DATA_INVALID: There is a problem with your registration - please contact support
failure.ACCREDITATION_UNEXPECTED: Accreditation number was provided but is not expected
failure.MATERIAL_DATA_INVALID: There is a problem with your registration - please contact support
failure.PROCESSING_TYPE_REQUIRED: The spreadsheet type could not be determined
failure.PROCESSING_TYPE_INVALID: The spreadsheet type is not recognised
failure.PROCESSING_TYPE_DATA_INVALID: There is a problem with your registration - please contact support
failure.PROCESSING_TYPE_MISMATCH: The spreadsheet type does not match your registration
failure.TEMPLATE_VERSION_REQUIRED: The template version could not be determined
failure.TEMPLATE_VERSION_INVALID: The template version is not recognised
failure.SEQUENTIAL_ROW_REMOVED: Rows have been removed since your summary log was last submitted - these must be re-added before you can submit your file
failure.HEADER_REQUIRED: The column headings in the file you selected have been changed - they must match the headings of the summary log template you originally downloaded

checkIntro: Your summary log has been validated and is ready to submit.
checkIntro2: Before submitting, you need to confirm that you're aware of the following.
loadsAdded_one: {{count}} new load will be added to your waste balance
loadsAdded_other: {{count}} new loads will be added to your waste balance
loadsAddedExplanation: These loads include all the information required in section 1 of your summary log.
loadsNotAdded_one: {{count}} new load will not be added to your waste balance
loadsNotAdded_other: {{count}} new loads will not be added to your waste balance
loadsNotAddedExplanation: These loads are missing information from section 1 of your summary log. They will not be added to your waste balance until you provide the missing information.
adjustmentsReflected: All adjustments will be reflected in your waste balance
loadsAdjustedExplanation: These loads include all the information required in section 1 of your summary log.
rowIdExplanation: These reference numbers are found in the 'Row ID' column of your summary log.
complianceSubheading: You must comply with your waste permit
complianceBody: By submitting this summary log, you are declaring that you have complied with the requirements of your environmental permit during the reporting period.
declarationIntro: By submitting this summary log, you confirm that:
declarationBullet1: the information provided is complete and accurate
declarationBullet2: you have the authority to submit this information on behalf of your organisation
successPanelTitle: Summary log for accreditation number {{accreditationNumber}} submitted
successInsetText: To change or add to the information you've provided, submit an updated summary log
